author: Special Correspondent
text:
A newly appointed woman Village Administrative Officer allegedly committed suicide by consuming rat poison.

The victim S. Usha (37) was appointed as VAO of Paachur village in Orathanadu taluk in Thanjavur district three months ago.

Police sources said she used to come to her house at Kiliyanurpatti near Jambunathapuram in the district during weekends where her husband and daughter stayed.

Police said the VAO was depressed as she found it difficult to cope as the family was away and she had to shuttle between her house and place of work.

The sources said she consumed rat poison a couple of days ago in her house and was admitted to a private hospital here where she died on Monday.

The Jambunathapuram police have registered a case.
title: Woman VAO commits suicide
